TaskService.description: The Task Service of a Redfish service allows scheduling and execution of long-duration processes.  It represents the properties for the Task Service itself and has links to the actual collection of Task resources.
TaskService.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a task service for a Redfish implementation.

title: #TaskService.TaskService
